Title: Let's do another test (Yangliuqing New Year print)
Publisher: Tianjin Yangliuqing huadian (天津杨柳青画店)
Notes: In the later 1970s reading booklets about martyrs for the Communist cause gave way to books that merely contained depoliticisized or book knowledge. These two children, Pioneers, are working with a language schoolbook (语文 - yuwen).
Theme: To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
